alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hartley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 10:54PM CDT until September 09 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DALLAM AND NORTHWESTERN HARTLEY COUNTIES... At 1054 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southeast of Texline, or 20 miles southeast of Clayton, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Dallam and northwestern Hartley Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
